Texts.Chs: 把^orange;甲基碘^reset;带给这名^green;穿着紫色护甲的科学家^reset;。 (位于^orange;科学前哨站^reset;顶层)
Texts.Eng: Bring the ^orange;Methyl Iodide^reset; to the ^green;purple-armored scientist^reset; at the top floor of the ^orange;Science Outpost^reset;.

Texts.Chs: 我需要一种特别危险的化学物质，它叫做^orange;甲基碘^reset;。这种物质对混合剂很有帮助,要我自己去拿可能会爆炸，你能帮我一把吗?
Texts.Eng: I need a particularly dangerous chemical known as ^orange;Methyl Iodide^reset;. That will do the trick for this mixture. I'd grab it myself but this might explode! Can you help me out?

Texts.Chs: ^orange;甲基碘^reset;是^gren;肥料^reset;的关键组成成分。如果你打算在水培托盘中种植作物，你会想要它的。
Texts.Eng: ^orange;Methyl Iodide^reset; is your key ingredient in ^green;fertilizers^reset;. You'll want it if you are going to be growing plants in growing/hydroponic trays.
